H0.text: Michael Morpurgo, author of the children's book War Horse, on which the 2012 Spielberg film (of the same name) is based, held what UK position from 2003-5. Poet Laureate

H1.text: Michael Morpurgo, author of the children's book War Horse, on which the 2012 Spielberg film (of the same name) is based, held what UK position from 2003-5. UK Literary Ambassador

H2.text: Michael Morpurgo, author of the children's book War Horse, on which the 2012 Spielberg film (of the same name) is based, held what UK position from 2003-5. President of the Society of Authors

H3.text: Michael Morpurgo, author of the children's book War Horse, on which the 2012 Spielberg film (of the same name) is based, held what UK position from 2003-5. Children's Laureate

A4.text: Morpurgo was the third Children's Laureate, from 2003 to 2005
